title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, February 27, 2022
description: Novelist John Steinbeck was born on this day in 1902. "The writer must believe that what he is doing is the most important thing in the world. And he must hold to this illusion even when he knows it is not true."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Novelist John Steinbeck was born on this day in 1902. "The writer must believe that what he is doing is the most important thing in the world. And he must hold to this illusion even when he knows it is not true."
